name: Baguette Steps
description: A sample task list for baking Baguettes

tasks.name: Create Preferment
tasks.description: Mix together 150 grams Bread Flour, 150 grams of warm filtered water and a pinch of yeast 12-14 hours before you bake your Baguettes

tasks.name: Mix preferment, Salt & Water
tasks.description: In a stand mixer add your Preferment, 13 grams of salt and 240 grams of warm filtered water for 2 minutes on medium low speed.

tasks.name: Mix Flour in with Preferment
tasks.description: Mix 400 grams of Bread Flour and your preferment water mix for 2 minutes on medium low speed.

tasks.name: Autolyse
tasks.description: Cover dough and let Autolyse for 20 minutes.

tasks.name: Add Yeast & Malt Powder
tasks.description: Add 3G Yeast and 10G of Malt Powder and mix on low for 2 minutes.

tasks.name: Knead the dough
tasks.description: Knead the dough on medium high in your stand mixer for 4.5 minutes.

tasks.name: Let rise
tasks.description: Remove the dough from the stand mixer bowl and place in a bowl then cover with plastic wrap for 30 minutes.

tasks.name: Fold dough
tasks.description: Fold dough over itself, re-cover and let rise for 2 hours.

tasks.name: Divide dough
tasks.description: Remove the dough from the bowl and using your scale, divide the dough into 3 pieces.

tasks.name: Preshape & Rise
tasks.description: Fold each dough piece into a ball shape, place each in a covered bowl or let rise covered on the counter for 30 minutes

tasks.name: Shape Baguettes
tasks.description: Pat down each dough piece, roughly shape into a rectangle and then fold the top down 3/4 of the way. Turn the dough and fold over itself. Next roll the dough into Baguette shapes and if you have a Baguette pan, place each loaf in the pan.

tasks.name: Let Baguettes Rise
tasks.description: Cover the Baguettes with a clean dish towel and let rise for 30 minutes. Preheat your oven to 550 degrees.

tasks.name: Score Baguettes
tasks.description: Using a Lame or a very sharp knife, score the top of the Baguettes on a slight angle about 4 times along the top of the Baguettes.

tasks.name: Bake Baguettes - Part 1
tasks.description: Bake Baguettes at 550 degrees for 8 minutes.

tasks.name: Bake Baguettes - Final
tasks.description: Turn down your oven to 400 degrees and continue baking Baguettes until they are golden brown, about 28-30 minutes.

tasks.name: Cool Baguettes
tasks.description: Cool Baguettes for about 15 minutes. Once cooled, slice into one and spread with butter. Enjoy!
